 I think numeric variable is essential.


```{r}
library(caret)
training <- read.csv("pml-training.csv")
testing <- read.csv("pml-testing.csv")


numeric_only <- sapply(training, is.numeric)

train_essential <- training[,numeric_only]

train_essential$classe <- training$classe

fit <- train(classe ~ . , data= train_essential ,preProcess=c("center","scale"),method="rf", prox=TRUE)




numeric_only2 <- sapply(testing, is.numeric)
test_essential <- testing[,numeric_only2]
 

#error.
predict(fit, newdata=test_essential)

```

I'll use random forest.but it took too much time.
